short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This program is built to record audio from audio streams on the WQRI website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The WQRI Recorder is designed specifically for recording audio from WQRI's website in an effort to create an archive of student curated shows for generations of students to experience in the future. This extension is easily configurable for the user and records high quality sounds straight through your browser!
